posts.message: If you are a YouTube addict and have a Mac, you might want to use Safari instead of Chrome/Firefox for your YouTube videos.

What is the largest production deployment of #Mesos?

-I know it's been bench marked on 50,000 nodes tested on AWS for a large company (either AirBNB, twitter or Netflix) so this might give an indication of what it's intended to grow 

-Probably Twitter where the project was incubated. ~100K physical nodes. They aren't terribly public about this.
posts.caption: quora.com
posts.description: Answer (1 of 3): I was A2A. Disclaimer: I don't have hard data, that is, I can't back up my statements concerning numbers with official sources. posts.message: “As a software developer, you are your own worst enemy. The sooner you realize that, the better off you’ll be.”
posts.caption: blog.codinghorror.com
posts.description: 30 May 2007 The Best Code is No Code At All Rich Skrenta writes that code is our enemy. Code is bad. It rots. It requires periodic maintenance. It has bugs that need to be found. New features mean old code has to be adapted. The more code you have, the more places there are for bugs to hide. The lon...
